org.gvsig.raster.cache.tile.provider

Interface Downloader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseTileDownloader, TileDownloaderForBingMaps, TileDownloaderForFiles, TileDownloaderForFiles_oldversion, TileDownloaderForGoogleMaps, TileDownloaderForOSM, TileDownloaderForPostGISRaster, TileDownloaderForWCS, TileDownloaderForWMS, TileDownloaderForWMTS

    public interface Downloader
    Tile cache uses this interface to get a tile and the data provider have to implement it to serve tiles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tile downloadTile(Tile tile)
      Gets a tile from the data source.
      Object[] getCrashImage(int w, int h)
      Gets the image that represent a crash tile
      Object[] getDownloadingImage(int w, int h)
      Gets the image that represent a tile while is downloading
      Tile readTileFromDisk(Tile tile)
      Reads a tile from the tile cache.

    • Method Detail

      • downloadTile

        Tile downloadTile(Tile tile)
           throws TileGettingException
        Gets a tile from the data source. The parameter tile contains the information of the tile to download. If the provider is a remote service this will have to download the tile from the server and if it is a file provider the source will be a file.
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile information
        param - Additional parameter
        Returns:
        Tile loaded
        Throws:
        TileGettingException

      • readTileFromDisk

        Tile readTileFromDisk(Tile tile)
               throws TileGettingException
        Reads a tile from the tile cache. The path to the tile is in the Tile object
        Parameters:
        tile -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        TileGettingException

        Object[] getDownloadingImage(int w,
                             int h)
        Gets the image that represent a tile while is downloading
        Returns:

        Object[] getCrashImage(int w,
                       int h)
        Gets the image that represent a crash tile
        Returns:
